- Watershed and hydrological modelling  
- River course changes, and sediment transport  
- ML/DL (Google Earth Engine, Python, R)  
- Agricultural geospatial modelling, climate–soil interactions  

🔭 I'm currently working on:  
*Spatial Modelling of Soil Degradation and Its Impact on Agricultural Sustainability in the Lower Ganga Delta*
